thread.title: Laser Lab Looks to Duplicate Success of Managed Print Solutions Offerings by Rolling Out New Website with Added Focus on Managed IT Services & Cloud Computing
thread.title_full: Laser Lab Looks to Duplicate Success of Managed Print Solutions Offerings by Rolling Out New Website with Added Focus on Managed IT Services & Cloud Computing

author: Michele McHenry
title: Laser Lab Looks to Duplicate Success of Managed Print Solutions Offerings by Rolling Out New Website with Added Focus on Managed IT Services & Cloud Computing
text:
Laser Lab, a managed printing and IT services company, is pleased to announce the roll out of its newly designed website which recently went live and can be found at http://www.laser-lab.com . The site’s homepage features a new, brightly-colored company logo and an uncluttered design. Other goals of the new site include making it faster, easier to navigate and more user friendly. The refreshed and responsive site has been rebuilt with extensive content about the company’s managed print solutions, cloud services and IT business solutions for businesses throughout the South Central Pennsylvania area. As a managed print and IT services thought leader, it was important for Laser Lab to provide information regarding its solutions, services and trends as easily accessible as possible for clients, prospects and other site visitors.
“We make it a point to provide our clients with the most accurate, up-to-date information and share our knowledge and expertise in the field of managed print and technology solutions,” said Michele McHenry, president and CEO, Laser Lab. “Our new site features entire sections dedicated to managed print services, IT services and the industries we serve. The navigation allows for a quick and effortless look at the services offered and industries served, as well as easy access to the client portal. Our team has collaboratively worked to create the new site so it’s rich with information and a valuable resource.”
To learn more about Laser Lab and its managed print and IT services, please visit http://www.laser-lab.com .
About Laser Lab
Laser Lab is a managed print services and IT services provider for small and medium businesses located throughout South Central Pennsylvania. Some of the company’s services and solutions include print services, office equipment management, OEM and remanufactured toner cartridges, cloud computing solutions, IT consulting, data backup and disaster recovery, and customized IT services. For more information about Laser Lab and its managed printing and IT support services and solutions, visit the company on the web at http://www.laser-lab.com . To learn more now, call 717.738.3333. To get the latest industry news and trends, go to http://www.laser-lab.com/blog/ .
